page.title: 10ENTERTAINMENT-LILLESHALL
page.content: In this area there are two main villages Lilleshall and Church Aston. Entertainment locally includes Whist Drives,Bingo,and Old Tyme Dancing,on a regular basis.There are also occasional Fashion Shows,Disco's, Cheese and Wine Evenings plus Coffee Mornings. {Theatre}-Most people visit the theatre at least once or twice a year.The people surveyed go to Donnington Little Theatre or The Grand Theatre in Wolverhampton. {Cinema}-Only 50% of the people surveyed visit the cinema regularly and they go to Bridgnorth,Shrewsbury, Wolverhampton,Birmingham and Stafford.
